name: locator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of equipment for finding where something is: Satellite locators will keep track of where the trucks are. This particular sat nav is not a very good speed camera locator.
a feature on a website that shows you where a particular shop, bank, etc. is on a map: Simply click on the store locator button and follow the directions to find the retailer nearest you. Locate your closest branch through the website’s online Branch Locator tool.
More examplesFewer examplesThe dog gives a good indication of the whereabouts of ferrets and rabbits underground, indicating where to begin sweeping the ground with a locator . Many people are keeping track of their children using family locator plans offered by major cellular providers.This app combines 3 tools — a nutritional database, a food-tracking tool to record meals, and a restaurant locator. Maps, store locators and route information are now considered a necessity on most corporate websites.
